subtitle: hilarious.
The only thing I know about this movie is that there are Lovecraftian trees. That's enough for me to justify a viewing...
Can someone please tell me how to use subtitles? Please! Thank you in advance.

@zbuf... rename your subtitle file that should be in .srt format so that your movie and subtitle file got same name. and place subtitle file in movie folder.you are done :).

you can download subtitle files from opensubtitle ...
